title: January transfer window 2021: When is deadline day around UK & Europe?
description: As the transfer window comes to a close, when is deadline day in the UK and Europe?

title: Accountants warned over fraud expectations
description: Should auditors be expected to spot companies, such as BHS and Wirecard - at risk of collapse through fraud?

title: Navalny: Thousands join fresh protests across Russia
description: More than 2,000 are detained as people gather in support of the detained opposition leader.

title: Rugby Australia offers to host this summer's British and Irish Lions tour
description: Rugby Australia offers to host this summer's British and Irish Lions series against South Africa.

title: HS2 underground protest: Activists 'being forced out' of tunnel
description: Activists have burrowed under London's Euston Square Gardens in protest over the HS2 rail project.

title: Covid: Lockdown easing must happen 'very slowly', advisor says
description: A "cautious" approach to reopening is needed, Public Health England's Dr Susan Hopkins says.

title: UK applying to join Asia-Pacific free trade pact CPTPP
description: If successful, Britain will join a club including Japan and Australia and covering 500m people.

title: Baby boy found dead at Wirral golf course
description: Police say they are treating the death as "unexplained" and are searching for the boy's mother.

title: Covid: 'Lessons to be learnt' from NI vaccine row - Irish PM
description: We need to "calm down" after the EU reverses a plan to put checks on the Irish border, Micheál Martin says.

title: Covid: Hospitals 'stable' but 'another hard year ahead'
description: Staff are "no longer having to plan to build extra capacity", an intensive care consultant says.

title: 'We did the right thing' - Reed benefits from controversial drop to share lead in California
description: Leader Patrick Reed denies breaking any wrongdoing after taking a controversial drop in the third round of the Farmers Insurance Open.

title: Covid: Australian city of Perth goes into snap lockdown after guard tests positive
description: Schools, bars and gyms close in the Australian city after a guard at a quarantine hotel tests positive.

title: Covid: Pandemic 'has highlighted archaic wedding laws'
description: Proposed changes to the law could allow people to marry in gardens and homes in Wales and England.

title: Peak District's last surviving mountain hares 'at risk'
description: Reduced snow coverings mean the hares may not be camouflaged in winter, despite their white coats.

title: Donald Trump 'parts with lawyers' before impeachment trial
description: Donald Trump has reportedly parted ways with lawyers representing him in his impeachment trial.

title: The Papers: EU 'vaccine blunder', and sport betting logo 'ban'
description: Fallout from the EU's U-turn on vaccine export controls features prominently on Sunday's front pages.

title: Match of the Day analysis: Is Grealish the Player of the Season?
description: Match of the Day pundits Jermaine Jenas and Ian Wright discuss whether Jack Grealish has been the player of the season after the England midfielder helps Aston Villa to a 1-0 Premier League win over Southampton at St Mary's.

title: 'When my name was butchered at school it made me feel different'
description: Yewande Biala has spoken about how mispronunciations of her name affect her, and other women agree.

title: UK's first Covid evacuees: 'I wish I'd stayed in Wuhan and missed flight'
description: Twelve months ago, 83 Britons fled Wuhan, the Covid-19 epicentre, but some wish they had never left.

title: Japan whale hunting: 'By-catch' rule highlighted after minke death
description: The death of a whale which got trapped in a net off Japan has once again exposed the hunting divide.

title: 'Life will never be the same; for me, it's better'
description: Kellie Larkin has cerebral palsy, is quadriplegic, non-verbal and communicates through a computer.

title: Could a vaccine get rid of malaria for good?
description: Seventeen-year-old Victoline explores progress to tackle the disease in her home country, Kenya.

title: 'I was scammed out of £17,000 on Instagram'
description: Since the pandemic hit the UK, reports of investment scams targeting Instagram users have risen 50%.

title: Lebanon ambulance driver: 'Hospitals can't take our Covid patients'
description: Lebanon's hospitals are turning away patients as the country buckles under Covid and economic collapse.
